org.jwave.model.playlist

Class PlaylistImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jwave.model.playlist.PlaylistImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, ESource<java.lang.Integer>, Playlist

    public class PlaylistImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Playlist, java.io.Serializable
    This is an implementation of Playlist that can be serialized.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
